evidence.text: a.  Certify the action as a class action pursuant to Fed. R.  Civ.  P.  23  and appoint Plaintiffs and Oliver Law Group PC as class representatives and class counsel respectively;
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint and Demand for Jury Trial

add_extracted.value: Certify the action as a class action pursuant to Fed. R. Civ. P. 23 and appoint Plaintiffs and Oliver Law Group PC as class representatives and class counsel respectively

evidence.text: b.  Adjudge and declare that the acts, omissions, policies, and practices of Defendants, and their agents, employees, officials
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint and Demand for Jury Trial

add_extracted.value: Adjudge and declare that the acts, omissions, policies, and practices of Defendants, and their agents, employees, officials ...

evidence.text: c.  Issue  a judgment against Defendants  in  an amount to  be  determined  at  trial,  including compensatory and punitive damages in an amount that is fair, just, and reasonable and will hold Defendants liable for the civil rights violations alleged.
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint and Demand for Jury Trial

add_extracted.value: Issue a judgment against Defendants in an amount to be determined at trial, including compensatory and punitive damages in an amount that is fair, just, and reasonable and will hold Defendants liable for the civil rights violations alleged

evidence.text: d.  Award Plaintiffs the costs of this suit, and reasonable attorneys' fees and litigation expenses pursuant to 42 U.S.C. § 1988, and other applicable law;
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint and Demand for Jury Trial

add_extracted.value: Award Plaintiffs the costs of this suit, and reasonable attorneys' fees and litigation expenses pursuant to 42 U.S.C. § 1988, and other applicable law

evidence.text: e.  Retain jurisdiction of this case until Defendants have fully complied with the orders of this Court, and there is a reasonable assurance that Defendants will continue to comply in the future absent continuing jurisdiction;
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint and Demand for Jury Trial

add_extracted.value: Retain jurisdiction of this case until Defendants have fully complied with the orders of this Court, and there is a reasonable assurance that Defendants will continue to comply in the future absent continuing jurisdiction

evidence.text: f.  Grant Plaintiffs such other relief as the Court deems appropriate and just.
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint and Demand for Jury Trial

add_extracted.value: Grant Plaintiffs such other relief as the Court deems appropriate and just
